title: (x) Curves logo - similar to Sarah Script {Stephen, Yves}
content:
Any idea on this beautiful script font?

Thanx  
Sruly

| --- | --- |
| [header\_logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119142609/http:/typophile.com/files/header_logo.gif) | 1.34 KB |

 [‹ (x) "Scum" outlined uncial - Manuscript Caps {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119142609/http:/typophile.com/node/17245 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Lo Editions" slab serif - Lubalin Graph {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119142609/http:/typophile.com/node/17265 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Sruly P

comments.content: Surely drawn for their logo, not a font. You might like [Sarah Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119142609/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/sarah-script/?refby=typographica).

Possibly/probably custom lettered, reminds me of [Spring](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119142609/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LP.100016.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Curves&sampleSize=48) or [Sarah Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119142609/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/sarah-script/sarah-script/testdrive.html).
There’s some weird echo in here.
Thanx so much for your reply, and is there some weird echo in here?
